text: (Napiye!) Vetattaiyutaiyavarkalil cilar irukkinranar. Avarkalitam nir oru (por) kuviyalaiye nampi oppataittapotilum (oru kuraivuminri) um'mitam tirumpa celutti vituvarkal. Avarkalil veru cilarum irukkinranar. Avarkalitam nir or arpa nanayattaiye nampi oppataittalum atarkaka nir (vampu ceytu) avarkal (talai) mel nirkata varai atait tirumpak kotukkamattarkal.
